txt.en: The Ship-slaves
<rgb=#00FF00>All the ship-slaves have been freed!</rgb>
Ship-slave freed!
Find and free ship-slaves who are manacled throughout the area.
'Oh please, will you free me from my chains?'
<rgb=#FF0000>Slaves must be freed before the Corsair defeat.</rgb>
'Thank you, thank you!'
'You are no Corsair. How came you here?'
<rgb=#FF0000>Quest will finish on Corsair defeat.</rgb>
'I will slip out among the chaos and be a slave no more!'
'Don't hurt me! I beg of you!'
'You mean I am free to go? Then I am gone!'
'Ah, the Corsairs, they beat a man and ride him hard!'
'Free! But I must run, before the Corsairs return!'
'The cruel masters left me here to rot!'
'A thousand thanks! Now I fly.'
'How sore my chains do chafe!'
We have caught sight of ship-slaves in this area. We should free as many as we can, to hobble the Corsairs' escape.
'How sore my chains did chafe! Let them lie - and me run far away!'
Liberated ship-slaves ([placeholder]/6)

Some of the slaves the Corsairs use to row their boats have been left in manacles around the area. Find them all and free them of their chains to set back any chance of a Corsair escape.

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Free fettered ship-slaves
* Free all of them as swiftly as possible
<rgb=#FF0000>The slaves have been lost in the rout!</rgb>
Ship-slave freed!
